comments: Favourite prof ever! Nicest man. Very helpful and understanding. All exams are open book. Very willing to help out and explain. Wants students to exceed. All exams are open book! Great classes.
I love Rudi. He\'s the sweetest and most caring teacher I\'ve ever had. He\'s really helpful and involved.
One of the best profs ever.
If you have never heard of a place called paradise, just take a course with this professor and you will experience it!!
The most understanding and best instructor to have!
Knows what it is like to be student! He understands that life sometimes gets in the way.
Rudi is a great teacher! Super nice, and helpful.
